ygData.subject: Re: A little ray of sunshine on an otherwise cloudy day
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure about this. I do have to do more testing though. A level 50 SK claims to have done 611 DMG. Unconfirmed of course. At level 46 (me), if my math is
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure about this.
I do have to do more testing though.
A level 50 SK claims to have done 611 DMG. Unconfirmed
of course.
At level 46 (me), if my math is correct:
First 40 levels: 40 * 10 = 400
Additional Levels: 6 * 20 = 120
-------------
520
+ 1
---
Total: 521

I HTd last night for 519. Thats my best so far. But I
have only been HTing high level MOBs so their resist
is pretty high.

If the PL is as bad today as it was yesterday, I will
have plenty of time to kill before I delve into a
dungeon. So some innocent Giant Rat will be
unceremoniously murdered for my experiment.

Anyone else have a chance to test this for themselves?


Thanks for the responses.



--- Leif <leifsmart@...> wrote:
> I beleive the bonus is for SK above lvl 40, where
> they get 20 dmg per lvl
> instead of 10.
> so lvl 50 does 601, lvl 48 does 561, etc etc
>
> Inosolan
>
> Countess Bathory D'Allatu wrote:
>
> > From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu
> <countess_bathory_69@...>
> >
> > It appears that the max damage for Harm Touch has
> been
> > increased.
> > I level 50 friend recently did 600ish.
> > I have only used HT once since the supposed
> chance. I
> > used it against Estrelle (or somehitng) in KK. It
> only
> > did 169. So the resist is still there.
> > Has anyone else noticed this, and have you figured
> out
> > the new formula for it?
> > Used to be: level * 10 + 1
> > Example: level 20 * 10 + 1 = 201 DMG
> >
> > Could be that its after a certain level too.
> >
> > Anyway, I will be paying closer attention to it
> today.
> > Maybe I'll just HT a giant rat or something.
> >
> > =====
> > Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
> > Bathory D'Allatu
> > Cazic-Thule
> >
>
